ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Icons and Symbols
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sarg Bjornson
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Ideology Expanded is a mini-series of mods aimed at expanding the content in ideology - be it memes, relics and symbols or icons alike.
Icons and Symbols module adds over 200 new icons for ideologies. Icons have been categorised based on their looks and utilise respective tags to make sure they only appear on specific ideologies - you should not encounter a Transhumanist domination ideology with a flower as their symbol.
In case of any feedback or bug reports, please utilise the comment section of the mod on the Steam workshop.
